title: 2020 NFL Survivor Squad: Building a perfect roster with one pick from each team (Football 5/26)
description:
What happens when you have to build an NFL squad with only one representative from each team? Well that's an exercise that Jared Dubin recently completed and discussed with Will Brinson. Patrick Mahomes and Bill Belichick have to be locks, right? There's a few more certainties on Dubin's list (6:30), but then things get tricky. The guys explore offensive selections (18:55), while mixing in other considerations for each position and team. Then, it's the defense's turn (35:15).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JADubin5
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

What happens when you have to build an NFL squad with only one representative from each team? Well that's an exercise that Jared Dubin recently completed and discussed with Will Brinson. Patrick Mahomes and Bill Belichick have to be locks, right? There's a few more certainties on Dubin's list (6:30), but then things get tricky. The guys explore offensive selections (18:55), while mixing in other considerations for each position and team. Then, it's the defense's turn (35:15).
